article_title: All the Ways Kasich and Cruz Are As Bad As Trump

article_metadata.description: If you look closely at the Republican candidates, you'll see that while they each take a different tone, they all stand for the same things.

og.description: There is no lesser of these evils.
og.title: All the Ways John Kasich and Ted Cruz Are As Bad As Trump

twitter.description: As the #NeverTrump movement gathers steam, it is important to look at the alternatives in the Republican race and ask if any of the candidates would be much different.
twitter.title: All the Ways John Kasich and Ted Cruz Are As Bad As Trump
